tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: she is an extremely talented *** ************* doctor. highly recommended . the way she makes you understand things is exceptional.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I found this clinic through Google reviews needing to find a new dentist. I was originally hesitant as in the past I've had bad experiences with dentists trying to rip me off by always telling me there was something that needed fixing. 
Dr. Ruchir is as good as they come! Him and his entire staff are really professional, and he never pushes treatments that you don't need. He is very honest, upfront, and conservative... so basically, he will do what's necessary to get you treated, but won't get too much with his recommendations.
Recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very good clinic and the doctor.Neeti also very friendly 
I would love to visit again for the treatment very satisfying 
Affordable also if you guys have any issue regarding your skin you can consult with dr.Neeti without hesitation thank you….

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very satisfying treatment. Once you share your symptoms and worry, she does not keep you in the dark. Everything is well explained, going through the different stages of treatment. Then a plan is worked out to treat the condition and we just have to follow it carefully.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It's a very nice clinic with ****** ******* ******** Doctors are very friendly . They have all advance technology. I really liked the way they gave audio and visual demo.Cost wise I think they are very reasonable , quality treatment at very affordable price. Will recommend every one to visit Healthy smile

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: My first experience at the clinic was impressive. I Got a scaling procedure done. The Dr. also explained the correct way of flossing and brushing that I was unaware of until now. Their "as you get treated" x ray facility was rather helpful in showing me where the problem was and also to take immediate action to not let it spread further. No wonder why my entire family trusts Dr. Neeti.  Good luck to Healthy smiles team

tags: None
review: There is noone who answered your call...i have booked my slot and try to connect with her about some medical precaution as i m looking for. This is very near to my home thats why i booked but there is no one who can answer your call and give you any kind of pre assisment. So my pre experience is not good even when i first time called no. Is busy but after that i have called 20 times but noone hv picked up my call.
reply_text:
Dear madhavi
Thanks for your feedback. I can really understand your issue.But its almost impossible for a dentist to attend call during treatment time,the phone is generally not in chamber. As i can see my call records after seeing your 5 missed calls i called you back as soon as i got free.. and answered almost all your queries. As far as treatment is concerned for that kindly book an appointment for visiting the clinic. You are most welcome. If you want to call for queries kindly call in clinic off timings i.e. 1 30 pm to 5 pm or after 9 pm. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very professional doctor who knows her core job. Explained in detail about the problem with home remedies and solutions to undertake betterment of my problem. Medicines prescribed have caused quick relief to my tooth abscess. I would very HIGHLY RECOMMEND Dr Neeti to everyone to contact her during any emergent tooth issue. Thanks a lot Dr Neeti.
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words sir!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Sharma wasn’t present (someone else was), thus her friendliness is in question. It would be nice if a professional can keep her commitments or inform patients of her unavailability.
reply_text:
Mr P. Banerjee, 

Regret that I was not able to see you on your first appointment.  It was one of the day when I was sick and took a sick leave.  My team tried contacting you on the mobile number provided to us but it was never answered.  As you took an online appointment few hours before the appointment time and was not available on the  phone, it was impossible to communicate my leave of absence.  Further, to not to waste your arrival efforts the appointment was squeezed in already tight schedule of another co-owner senior doctor Dr Ruchir, from which you undertook treatment for your cleaning of teeth.  It was also good to know that you had no issues during the treatment which you conveyed to me when I met you personally and I continued your treatment in subsequent appointments.

We doctors sometimes also fall ill and do take leaves but here in Healthy Smiles Dental Clinic we make sure every patient is still treated with utmost care and highest level of professionalism, because of which you were not sent back and were seen by my husband Dr Ruchir.  Hope we as a team were able help you out in treatment of your issues and would be pleased to treat you in future.

Hope it helps.  Cheers!
